h2_title: Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide
content: When his shield is down again, follow up with heavy attacks, and Immobilize if you're using Spells. He'll quickly reach 50% health and go up in the air again.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Erlang,_The_Sacred_Divinity.md', within the main section titled 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When his shield is down again, follow up with heavy attacks, and Immobilize if you're using Spells. He'll quickly reach 50% health and go up in the air again.
